005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.xml;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.AbstractModuleLoader;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IModuleLoader;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.MetaschemaException;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.ExternalConstraintsModulePostProcessor;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.IConstraintSet;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.xml.impl.XmlModule;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.xml.xmlbeans.METASCHEMADocument;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.CollectionUtil;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
017
018import org.apache.xmlbeans.XmlException;
019import org.apache.xmlbeans.XmlOptions;
020import org.xml.sax.InputSource;
021import org.xml.sax.SAXException;
022import org.xml.sax.XMLReader;
023
024import java.io.IOException;
025import java.net.URI;
026import java.util.Collection;
027import java.util.List;
028import java.util.stream.Collectors;
029
030import javax.xml.XMLConstants;
031import javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException;
032import javax.xml.parsers.SAXParser;
033import javax.xml.parsers.SAXParserFactory;
034
035import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
036
037/**
038 * Provides methods to load a Metaschema expressed in XML.
039 * <p>
040 * Loaded Metaschema instances are cached to avoid the need to load them for
041 * every use. Any Metaschema imported is also loaded and cached automatically.
042 */
043public class ModuleLoader
044    extends AbstractModuleLoader<METASCHEMADocument, IXmlMetaschemaModule> {
045  private boolean resolveEntities; // = false;
046  @NonNull
047  private final List<IModuleLoader.IModulePostProcessor> modulePostProcessors;
048
049  /**
050   * Construct a new Metaschema loader.
051   */
052  public ModuleLoader() {
053    this(CollectionUtil.<IModuleLoader.IModulePostProcessor>emptyList());
054  }
055
056  /**
057   * Construct a new Metaschema loader, which applies the provided constraints to
058   * loaded modules.
059   *
060   * @param constraints
061   *          a set of Metaschema module constraints
062   */
063  public ModuleLoader(@NonNull Collection<IConstraintSet> constraints) {
064    this(CollectionUtil.singletonList(new ExternalConstraintsModulePostProcessor(constraints)));
065  }
066
067  /**
068   * Construct a new Metaschema loader, which use the provided module post
069   * processors when loading a module.
070   *
071   * @param modulePostProcessors
072   *          post processors to perform additional module customization when
073   *          loading
074   */
075  public ModuleLoader(@NonNull List<IModuleLoader.IModulePostProcessor> modulePostProcessors) {
076    this.modulePostProcessors = modulePostProcessors;
077  }
078
079  /**
080   * Enable a mode that allows XML entity resolution. This may be needed to parse
081   * some resource files that contain entities. Enabling entity resolution is a
082   * less secure, which requires trust in the resource content being parsed.
083   */
084  public void allowEntityResolution() {
085    resolveEntities = true;
086  }
087
088  @Override
089  protected IXmlMetaschemaModule newModule(
090      URI resource,
091      METASCHEMADocument binding,
092      List<? extends IXmlMetaschemaModule> importedModules)
093      throws MetaschemaException {
094    IXmlMetaschemaModule module = new XmlModule(resource, binding, importedModules);
095
096    for (IModuleLoader.IModulePostProcessor postProcessor : modulePostProcessors) {
097      postProcessor.processModule(module);
098    }
099    return module;
100  }
101
102  @Override
103  protected List<URI> getImports(METASCHEMADocument binding) {
104    return ObjectUtils.notNull(binding.getMETASCHEMA().getImportList().stream()
105        .map(imported -> URI.create(imported.getHref()))
106        .collect(Collectors.toList()));
107  }
108
109  /**
110   * Parse the provided XML resource as a Metaschema module.
111   *
112   * @param resource
113   *          the resource to parse
114   * @return the XMLBeans representation of the Metaschema module
115   * @throws IOException
116   *           if a parsing error occurred
117   */
118  @Override
119  protected METASCHEMADocument parseModule(@NonNull URI resource) throws IOException {
120    METASCHEMADocument metaschemaXml;
121    try {
122      XmlOptions options = new XmlOptions();
123      if (resolveEntities) {
124        SAXParserFactory factory = SAXParserFactory.newInstance();
125
126        try {
127          // factory.setFeature(XMLConstants.FEATURE_SECURE_PROCESSING, true);
128          factory.setFeature("http://apache.org/xml/features/disallow-doctype-decl", false);
129          factory.setFeature("http://xml.org/sax/features/external-general-entities", true);
130          factory.setFeature("http://xml.org/sax/features/external-parameter-entities", true);
131          SAXParser parser = factory.newSAXParser();
132          parser.setProperty(XMLConstants.ACCESS_EXTERNAL_DTD, "file"); // ,jar:file
133          XMLReader reader = parser.getXMLReader();
134          reader.setEntityResolver((publicId, systemId) -> null);
135          options.setLoadUseXMLReader(reader);
136        } catch (SAXException | ParserConfigurationException ex) {
137          throw new IOException(ex);
138        }
139        // options.setLoadEntityBytesLimit(204800);
140        // options.setLoadUseDefaultResolver();
141        options.setEntityResolver((publicId, systemId) -> {
142          String effectiveSystemId = systemId;
143          // TODO: It's very odd that the system id looks like this. Need to investigate.
144          if (effectiveSystemId.startsWith("file://file://")) {
145            effectiveSystemId = effectiveSystemId.substring(14);
146          }
147          URI resolvedSystemId = resource.resolve(effectiveSystemId);
148          return new InputSource(resolvedSystemId.toString());
149        });
150        options.setLoadDTDGrammar(true);
151      }
152      options.setBaseURI(resource);
153      options.setLoadLineNumbers();
154      metaschemaXml = ObjectUtils.notNull(METASCHEMADocument.Factory.parse(resource.toURL(), options));
155    } catch (XmlException ex) {
156      throw new IOException(ex);
157    }
158    return metaschemaXml;
159  }
160
161}
